badge.title: Free SSO/IdP Support
badge.description: Awarded to projects or vendors that offer built-in SSO/IdP integration (e.g., OIDC, SAML, LDAP) without requiring an enterprise-tier subscription.

requirements.must_offer: At least one identity integration method without enterprise-tier restriction

optional_features: No seat/user-based restriction for IdP use
IdP enabled by default or via simple config toggle

process: Manual review of documentation and/or code
Screenshots or test instance for UI-based apps
